scripts.patch: pnpm run version:eslint patch && pnpm run version:prettier patch && pnpm run version:stylelint patch
scripts.minor: pnpm run version:eslint minor && pnpm run version:prettier minor && pnpm run version:stylelint minor
scripts.major: pnpm run version:eslint major && pnpm run version:prettier major && pnpm run version:stylelint patch
scripts.deploy: pnpm run deploy:eslint && pnpm run deploy:prettier && pnpm run deploy:stylelint
